SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminEventAdapter
Adapter for displaying Event items in RecyclerView within the Admin view.
AdminEventAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Interface for handling click events on Event items.
AdminEventAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for caching view references within each event card.
AdminMainFragment
Main administrative panel fragment providing navigation to various admin sections.
AdminNotificationAdapter
Adapter for displaying all notifications in the admin view.
AdminNotificationAdapter.NotificationWithUser
Wrapper class to store notification with user information.
AdminNotificationAdapter.OnNotificationClickListener
Interface for handling notification click events.
AdminNotificationFragment
Fragment for displaying all notifications from all users in the system.
AdminPosterAdapter
Adapter for displaying Event posters in a RecyclerView for administrative management.
AdminPosterAdapter.OnPosterClickListener
Interface for handling click events on poster cards.
AdminPosterAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for caching view references within each poster card.
AdminPosterDetailFragment
Fragment to display the full details of a poster/event for administrative review.
AdminPosterFragment
Fragment for displaying all events in the system for administrative management.
AdminUserAdapter
Adapter for displaying User objects in a RecyclerView within the Admin view.
AdminUserAdapter.OnUserActionListener
Interface for handling user action events.
AdminUserAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder class for caching view references within each user card.
AdminUserFragment
Fragment for displaying all user profiles from the database in the admin view.
AdminViewTest
UI tests for Admin fragment navigation.
Entrant
Represents an Entrant user in the Haboob application.
EntrantMainFragment
Displays the entrant home screen containing two carousels: My upcoming events – events the current device/user is enrolled in My open waitlists – events the user is currently waiting on (or all for testing)
Event
Event models a single event and encapsulates both its metadata (title, dates, organizer, tags, poster/QR) and dynamic participant lists (invited, waiting, enrolled, cancelled).
EventAdapter
ArrayAdapter for displaying Event objects in a simple list view.
EventImageAdapter
RecyclerView adapter that renders a horizontal carousel of event posters by URL.
EventImageAdapter.OnItemClick
 
EventImageAdapter.ViewHolder
ViewHolder holding the poster ImageView, event title TextView, and red dot indicator.
EventQRCodeFragment
Fragment that displays and manages QR codes for events.
EventsList
EventsList manages all Event objects in the Firestore "events" collection.
EventsList.OnEventsLoadedListener
Callback interface for asynchronous Firestore operations.
EventsListTest
Unit tests for EventsList logic that can be executed without Firestore or Android.
EventTest
Unit tests for Event that verify its in-memory behavior (no Firebase or Android dependencies).
EventViewerFragment
Displays the details of a single event, including title, hero image, and actions (join/leave waitlist, leave event, view QR code).
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
HistoryAdapter
Adapter for displaying event history with images and titles.
HistoryAdapter.OnEventClickListener
Interface for handling event click callbacks.
HistoryFragment
Fragment that displays all events the user has ever joined a waitlist for.
LotterySampler
Helper class for handling lottery logic for events.
LotterySamplerTest
Unit tests for LotterySampler.
MainActivity
Main activity for the Haboob application.
MockEventsRepo
 
MockFirebaseTests
Unit tests using Mockito to verify Firestore behavior WITHOUT touching the real network or the Firebase emulator.
NonScrollExpandableListView
Custom ExpandableListView that disables scrolling and expands to show all content.
Notification
Model class representing a notification sent from an organizer to an event entrant.
NotificationManager
Handles creating, sending, logging, and retrieving Notification objects for users and organizers using Firestore.
NotificationManager.NotificationsCallback
Callback for returning user notifications or handling errors.
NotificationManagerTest
Unit tests for NotificationManager.
NotificationsAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying notifications.
NotificationsAdapter.OnNotificationClickListener
Interface for handling notification click callbacks.
NotificationsFragment
Fragment for displaying and managing user notifications.
Organizer
Organizer represents a user with permissions to create and manage events.
OrganizerAllListsFragment
Fragment used by organizers to review and manage all entrant-related lists for a single Event, and to visualize entrant signup locations on a Google Map.
OrganizerEditPosterFragment
Fragment that lets an organizer preview and update the poster image for a given Event.
OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter
OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter is a custom adapter used to populate an ExpandableListView with entrant data for a selected event.
OrganizerExpandableListsAdapter.OnChildItemClickListener
 
OrganizerExpandableListsData
OrganizerExpandableListsData is a utility class that prepares entrant-related lists for display in an ExpandableListView.
OrganizerExpandableListsDataTest
Unit tests for OrganizerExpandableListsData, which maps an Event's entrant lists into a HashMap for display in an ExpandableListView.
OrganizerMainActivity
OrganizerMainActivity is the entry point for organizer workflows.
OrganizerNewEventFragment
OrganizerNewEventFragment is responsible for creating a new Event in the organizer’s account.
OrganizerOptionsFragment
OrganizerOptionsFragment is the main fragment displayed for organizers after logging in.
Poster
Simple model class representing an event poster, storing a URL or image data string.
PresetTags
Holds a global list of preset event tags that organizers can choose from when creating or filtering events.
ProfileFragment
Fragment that allows users to view and update their account information.
QRCode
QRCode class for generating and managing QR codes based on event IDs Uses ZXing library to generate QR code bitmaps
RegisterActivity
Activity for user registration.
SplashActivity
Splash screen activity that serves as the entry point of the application.
User
Abstract base class representing a user in the Haboob application.
WaitlistAdapter
Adapter responsible for displaying Event objects inside a ListView in the Waitlists screen.
WaitlistsFragment
Fragment responsible for displaying all available waitlists (events that the entrant can browse or join).
